definition: to die in an accident/to die for a just cause
victim of an accident/casualty/martyr for one's country

sentences.english: He became a martyr to French-Canadians.
sentences.chinese: 他成爲說法語的加拿大人的死難者。

sentences.english: Ghosts of Lost Souls at Sea to be Shepherded Through the Watery Passageway.
sentences.chinese: 海上死難者的靈魂將乘着水路被保駕護航。

sentences.english: There are many women and children among the victims, who fell down and were trampled.
sentences.chinese: 很多死難者是婦女和兒童，她們在混亂中被擠倒踩死。

sentences.english: Family members mourned the loss of their loved ones at the World Trade Center.
sentences.chinese: 家屬在世貿中心悼念死難者。

sentences.english: I just want to wish all victims of 911 rest in peace.
sentences.chinese: 我在此只想祝願所有911的死難者安息。

sentences.english: All our friends are going or gone and we survive amongst the dead and the dying as on a battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 而我們則是戰場上死難者和垂死者中的倖存者。

sentences.english: The victims were from the country's French-speaking region, Heer said.
sentences.chinese: Heer說，這些死難者都是來自瑞士境內的法語區。

sentences.english: After the opening ceremony and all staff visit a memorial, to pay homage dead miners.
sentences.chinese: 揭牌儀式後，全體人員參觀紀念館，憑弔死難礦工。

sentences.english: People from every country voluntarily passed the hat around and collected as much as ten thousand dollars.
sentences.chinese: 各國人自發爲死難者募捐，錢萬美元之巨。

sentences.english: A fund will be set up for the dead men's families.
sentences.chinese: 撫卹死難工家屬的基金會即將建立起來。

sentences.english: Chinese people came out on the streets and bowed their heads, in remembrance of the quake victims.
sentences.chinese: 中國人走出大街，低下頭，哀悼地震中的死難者。

sentences.english: Soldiers lay individual wreaths for victims at the Pentagon Memorial in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓五角大樓紀念館，士兵爲死難者敬獻花圈。

sentences.english: , and long one of the more outspoken relatives.
sentences.chinese: 他是死難者親屬中最直言不諱的。

sentences.english: Megatron and several damaged Seekers are abandoned in space.
sentences.chinese: 威震天與衆死難戰士被棄於太空。

sentences.english: The cenotaph stands as a remembrance of those killed during the war.
sentences.chinese: 矗立着的紀念碑是對戰爭中死難者的紀念。

sentences.english: They also noted who survived and who didn't.
sentences.chinese: 他們還記下了倖存者和死難者。
